grocery_list:
- 7 ¾ cups flour
- 1 ½ cups liquid (water, milk, or juice)
- 2 ½ to 3 cups of your favorite fruits, fresh or frozen
- 3 cups Greek yogurt (plain or flavored)
- 1 cup ice for more liquid and texture
- ½ cup leafy greens (optional)
- 2 tsp chia seeds and/or flax seeds (optional)
- Sweetener of your choice (optional)
- 1 scoop protein powder (optional)
- 2 tbsp. peanut or nut butter (optional)
- 14 eggs
- Water
- 24 flour tortillas
- 12 small potatoes
- Grated cheese
- Cooked bacon or sausage
- Green pepper
- Salsa
- 4 ¾ cups milk (skim, 1%, or of your choice)
- 1 serving of Carnation Instant Breakfast, Ovaltine, chocolate protein powder or other chocolate powder that can be added to milk
- 2 bananas (½ frozen, ½ cut in chunks)
- ¼ cup dry oats
- Small handful of nuts (walnuts, almonds, or pecans are delicious)
- 4 tsp. sugar
- 6 tsp. baking powder
- 2 tbsp. oil (or substitute with plain low-fat Greek or regular yogurt)
- 1 ½ tsp salt
- 2 cups yogurt
- 1 ½ cup orange juice, or as much as needed
- 1 tsp vanilla extract
- 2 cups unsweetened frozen sliced or chopped peaches
- 2 cups frozen unsweetened strawberries
- ½ cup blueberries
- ½ kiwi, sliced
- 4 cups fresh spinach
- 1 ½ cup ice cubes
- 1 ½ cup fat-free milk
- ½ cup 100-percent apple juice
- Nut butter
- Sliced bananas
- Honey
- Avocado
- Salt
- Pepper
- Hummus
- Cooked veggies
- Nutella
- Sliced fruit (strawberries, bananas)
- Low-fat herbed cream cheese
- Sliced cucumbers
- Toast toppings of choice (jam, cheese, fruit, vegetables)
- 3 cups rolled oats
- 3 cups quick oats
- 1 cup powdered milk
- 1 cup sugar (white or brown)
- 2 tsp salt (scant)
- 2 tsp cinnamon
- Ideas for toppings: dried fruit, fresh fruit, canned fruit, nuts, seeds, mini chocolate chips, peanut butter, jam, etc.
- 1 banana, frozen
- 1 tbsp. natural peanut butter
- 1 ¾ c flour
- ¼ cup sugar or mashed ripe bananas
- 1/3 cup oil (or substitute with plain low-fat Greek or regular yogurt)
- 1 egg lightly beaten
- 2/3 cup plain Greek yogurt
- 2 tbsp. chia seeds or ground flax seeds
- Up to 4 tbsp. honey or maple syrup
- Optional Mix-ins (fruit, nut butter, cocoa powder, coconut, nuts)
- ½ cup unsweetened plain almond milk (or milk of your choice)
- ¾ tbsp. chia seeds
- 2 tbsp. natural peanut butter, almond butter, or nut butter of your choice (can be creamy or chunky)
- 1 tbsp. maple syrup (can substitute for your preferred sweetener)
- Optional toppings (bananas, strawberries, other fruit, granola, ground flax seeds or chia seeds)
- 1 cup fresh, frozen, or dried cranberries
- ¼ cup more sugar
- Orange zest to taste
- 2 egg yolks
- 2 egg whites
- ¾ cup fresh or frozen blueberries
- 1 tsp zested lemon peel (optional)
